TakeRecorderPreInitialize: Called before initialization occurs (ie. when the recording button is pressed and before the countdown starts)
TakeRecorderStarted: Called when take recorder is started
TakeRecorderStopped: Called when take recorder is stopped
TakeRecorderFinished: Called when take recorder has finished
TakeRecorderCancelled: Called when take recorder is cancelled
TakeRecorderMarkedFrameAdded: Called when a marked frame is added to take recorder
